Render Mastery Render Mastery is a powerful tool for enhancing your gaming experience, providing you with a wide range of settings to fine-tune your graphics and performance. Utilizing Colossal and Game.Rendering.Utilities, Render Mastery offers a comprehensive suite of options through Game.Settings and Game.UI.Widgets.
This mod replaces the older versions 'ReRenderingOptions', 'Dynamic Resolution Extended' plus 'Performance Squeezer' from third party modding sites.
Features Advanced Settings Tab: Access advanced settings under the "Advanced" tab. Basic Settings Tab: Explore basic settings under the "Basic Tab." Graphics Settings Adaptive Dynamic Resolution Scale: Adjust the adaptive dynamic resolution scale. Level of Detail: Force-tune and switch the level of detail settings. Global Quality Level: Adjust the global quality level of rendering. Global Texture Mipmap Limit: Set the global texture mipmap limit. Shadow Distance: Control the distance at which shadows are rendered. Shadow Cascades: Adjust the number of shadow cascades. Shadow Projection: Set the shadow projection mode. Shadow Near Plane Offset: Adjust the shadow near plane offset. Realtime Reflection Probes: Toggle realtime reflection probes. Billboards Face Camera Position: Toggle billboards facing the camera position. Anti-Aliasing: Adjust anti-aliasing settings. This feature is experimental and might conflict with other settings. Async Upload Time Slice: Set the async upload time slice. Async Upload Buffer Size: Set the async upload buffer size. Terrain Detail Density Scale: Adjust the terrain detail density scale. Terrain Pixel Error: Set the terrain pixel error. Terrain Basemap Distance: Set the terrain basemap distance. Terrain Detail Distance: Set the terrain detail distance. Terrain Tree Distance: Set the terrain tree distance. Terrain Billboard Start: Set the terrain billboard start. Terrain Fade Length: Set the terrain fade length. Terrain Max Trees: Terrain max trees. Also an experimental feature. Troubleshooting All settings are stored in \AppData\LocalLow\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\ModsData\RenderMastery.
The settings menu also includes a support button that links to my Discord server for immediate assistance. Additionally, there is a reset button that restores settings to their default values.
Enjoy!
